head.title: Home - Waterford School

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

ul.li: Starting on March 24th the Waterford School's Hours will be 8:00am - 12:00pm

Announcement: The Caledonia Cooperative SD Board voted to delay the Annual Meeting and budget vote (previously warned for May 4th and May 5th) until further notice. The meetings and vote will be re-warned and held when the current COVID-19 situation allows it.

a.title: POSTPONED-CCSD Voting - Barnet, Walden and Waterford
